input.sentences: young cristiano was only three years old .
though young | he has already been touted as a future world great in soccer .
grandpa is happy | and he wants to photograph the whole progression .
cristiano runs after the ball | his opponents already resigning to the sidelines .
output.sentences: My sister is a big fan of Cristiano Reynaldo.
He is a world famous soccer player and has touted many awards.
My grandpa knows she loves watching the progression of his career, and took a photograph of him for her, which made her very happy.
She dreams of someday sitting on the sidelines and watches as he runs on the field. Her worst fear is him resigning.
She loves soccer so much that her son has even joined a team!
